game.name: Ho-Bag Gonu
game.history: Ho-Bag Gonu is a Korean game with an uncertain history. It is a blockade game, similar to others found throughout Asia.
game.board: Unique board with 3 “home” spots in the top and bottom and a circle with diamond with 4 spots in the middle and a center spot all connected with one-another.
game.tomove: Move a piece to an adjacent empty space on a connected route.
game.towin: A player wins by blocking the other player from being able to move.
game.rules: Each player has three pieces. Players take turns moving a piece to an empty dot. Players cannot return to their starting three dots. Pieces that move into the opponent’s starting three dots cannot exit them.

gamescrafters.gamescrafter: Alec Jeffrey Romain Van Kerckhove (Backend, GamesmanUni GUI)
